name: Big Buck Hunter II: Sportsman's Paradise
overview: Big Buck Hunter II: Sportsman's Paradise is a Sports game, developed by Play Mechanix and published by Incredible Technologies, which was released in 2003.  A shooting game where the player uses a pump-action shotgun to hunt deer and elk in various terrain in the United States and Canada. One of several sequels to the original Big Buck Hunter arcade release in 2000.
